text: Now, the illegal nature of spoofing. In Australia, layering and spoofing 2014 referred to the act of submitting a genuine order on one side of the book and multiple orders at different prices on the other side of the book to give the impression of substantial supply and demand with a view to sucking After the genuine order trades, the multiple orders on the other side are rapidly withdrawn. So I explained that a little bit earlier on. So just to make you understand, you're showing one side of the book looking artificially strong, so you get filled on the other side of the book and the moment you get your full, you pull those orders away and you profit as the market starts to paddock. And that is the illegal nature of spoofing, because you have no intention of being hit on the orders that you show on the order book.
